name: Titanium.UI.iPhone.RowAnimationStyle
summary: A set of constants for the Animation Styles used for transition on table view rows.

constants.name: BOTTOM
constants.summary: The inserted row or rows slides in from the bottom; the deleted row or rows slides out toward the bottom.

constants.name: FADE
constants.summary: The inserted or deleted row or rows fades into or out of the table view.

constants.name: LEFT
constants.summary: The inserted row or rows slides in from the left; the deleted row or rows slides out to the left.

constants.name: NONE
constants.summary: No animation is performed. The new cell value appears as if the cell had just been reloaded.

constants.name: RIGHT
constants.summary: The inserted row or rows slides in from the right; the deleted row or rows slides out to the right.

constants.name: TOP
constants.summary: The inserted row or rows slides in from the top; the deleted row or rows slides out toward the top.
